bill_title: exempt investment gains from the tax levied on premiums and consideration for annuities for section 1035 exchanges.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to exempt investment gains from the tax levied on premiums and consideration for annuities for section 1035 exchanges. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That § 10-44-2.1 be amended to read as follows: 10-44-2.1. The provisions of § 10-44-2 and this section shall be are retroactive to July 1, 2001, and shall apply to any premium tax for any life insurance policy with an annual premium exceeding one hundred thousand dollars and to any annuity with an annual consideration exceeding five hundred thousand dollars. However, the provisions of § 10-44-2 do not apply to the original amount paid or invested in any contract that is the subject of an exchange meeting the requirements of section 1035 of the Internal Revenue Code, but the provisions of § 10-44-2 do apply to any investment gain on the original contract. 180 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.052 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
